Plot: The life stories of the six men who raised the flag at The Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in WWII.
Title: Flags of Our Fathers
Writer: William Broyles Jr. (screenplay), Paul Haggis (screenplay), James Bradley (book), Ron Powers (book)
Actors: Ryan Phillippe, Jesse Bradford, Adam Beach, John Benjamin Hickey
tomatoConsensus: Flags of Our Fathers is both a fascinating look at heroism, both earned and manufactured, and a well-filmed salute to the men who fought at the battle of Iwo Jima.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 24 nominations.
